name: Temmie Flakes
description:
Left and Right Arrow Keys to move.

You get points for catching flakes in your mouth, but they don't really count for anything. There's no win or lose state, just have fun bouncin' dem flakes around.

Inspired by the Griffinilla song of the same name. It is reccomended to loop this video while playing: https://youtu.be/FvxzKpMHMTQ
